item.title: Anime: The good, the bad and the popular
item.author: surfsafetynet@gmail.com (Overlytic)
item.description: As indicated in my previous post, I am going to analyse a tidy tuesday dataset for this blog post. I will be using the R programming language and the excellent series of packages called the tidyverse. This weekâ€™s tidy tuesday dataset is about anime, and comes from MyAnimeList.net. I find this especially exciting since I have enjoyed quite a bit of anime in my life - much to the dismay of my girlfriend.
